Articles.Content: So to keep it short, I saw this video about the KSP devs up on a stage talking about the early development of this game. And I'd like to watch it again, but I cannot find it anywhere, could someone please link it?

I think this is the one you're talking about.

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/mXTxQko-JH0?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
